ユーロ・タワーにある教室のひとつで扉の中を眺めまわすと、\n小さな体格でふわふわ:
I looked around the door in one of the classrooms in Euro Tower
I can see a fluffy girl with a small build in my eyes.
あ、いた。\nおーい、ケイト。:
Ah, there she is.
Hey, Kate.
（……いや、声をかけただけなのになんで逃げる！？）: (...No, all I did was call out to her. Why are you running away?!)
え、何あの人……\nフルニエさんが逃げていったんだけど……:
Huh? What's with that guy?
Fulnier ran away, but...
最近生徒会に来たって人じゃない？\nなんか危ない人なのかな……:
Isn't she the one who came to the student council recently?
I wonder if she's a dangerous person...
（変に注目が……早くケイトを追いかけよう。\n『アレ』を渡さないといけないし……:
(Strange attention... Let's hurry and chase after Kate.
I have to give her that thing...)
……が、正直、舐めていた。足は速いものの、\n追いつくのに苦労はしないだろうと思:
...But to be honest, I was licking it. My legs were fast, but...
I figured she wouldn't have any trouble keeping up, but...
塀をぴょいと飛び越しビルの隙間をぐりんぐりん縫い、\n屋根まで伝って――:
She hopped over the fence and sewed her way through the gaps between the buildings
It ran all the way up to the roof—
でも俺だって、身体動かすのは得意だからな……！: But I'm good at moving my body too...!
ハァ……ハァ……！ よし……やっと捕まえた！: Hah... hah...! All right... I've finally caught you!
（これじゃまるで、俺がハァハァ言いながら、\n女の子の手を捕まえた危ないやつじゃ:
(It's like I'm panting and panting,
He's the dangerous one who grabbed a girl's hand!)
あ、ああああなた何者ですか！？\nなんでついてこれるんですか！？:
Wh-Wh-Who are you?!
Why are you following me?!
化け物ですか！？ 怪物ですか！？ メイズシフターですか！？\nわたしは食べても美:
A monster?! A monster!? A maise shifter?!
I don't taste good even if I eat it!
食べない食べない！\nほら、これ！落し物を届けに来たんだ！:
Don't eat, don't!
Here, take this! I'm here to deliver a lost item!
裏に可憐な刺繍で『ケイト・フルニエ』とある、写真の入った定期入れ。\n彼女の落と:
There's a picture of a commuter pass with cute embroidery on the back that says "Kate Furnier."
It's her lost item. I just happened to pick it up on the side of the road.
あっ……と、ということは、あなたは、\nほ、本当に届け物をしたかっただけで……！:
Ah... Th-That means you're...
I-I really just wanted to deliver something...!?
ご、ごめんなさいごめんなさい！ お手を、いや足を煩わせてしまって\n本当にごめん:
I-I'm sorry, I'm so sorry! My hands, no, my feet are bothering you.
I'm really sorry! For treating you like a monster!
ははは……大丈夫。\n気にしてないから。:
Hahaha... I'm fine.
Because it doesn't bother me.
（素早くて、追いかけるのはすごく大変だったけど……）: (It was so fast, it was really hard to chase after her, but...)
ところでそれ、定期入れだよな？\n中には写真しか入ってないみたいだが……:
By the way, that's a commuter pass, right?
It looks like there's only a picture inside...
はい！ ここに写真を入れて、持ち歩けるようにしてるんです。: Yes! I put a picture here so I can carry it around with me.
スマートデバイスもあるこのご時世に、\nわざわざ現物の写真を持ち歩くとは珍しいな:
There are smart devices in this day and age
It's rare to see someone carrying a real photo around with them.
（その写真に映っているのは、ドロテアとリュシーか。\nどちらも凛々しくて、良い表:
(The people in that picture are Dorothea and Lucy.
Both of them are dignified and have good expressions.)
いつかふたりみたいに、自信に満ちた自分になれるようにって。\nふたりは、わたしの:
So that one day, I could be as confident as the two of us.
The two of them are people I admire...
ふたりのことをすごく尊敬してるんだな。: She really respects them, doesn't she?
その……わたし、昔からいつもウジウジしちゃって、\nよく人を苛つかせてしまうんで:
Um... I've always been fidgeting,
I often make people suffer...
だから……ちょっと前のことなんですが、攻撃的な人達に、\n悪口、言われちゃったり:
That's why... It was a little while ago, but I told the aggressive people...
People are badmouthing me... They're messing with me...
友達のミリィちゃんやハリィちゃんも……巻き込んじゃって……: My friends Milly and Harrie... They got dragged into this, too...
でも……ある日、ドロテア様と、リュシー様が助けてくれたんです。\n颯爽と割って入:
But... one day, Lady Dorothea and Lady Lucy saved me.
She boldly butted in and boldly retorted... She was so cool...
それを機に……ドロテア様にお仕えさせていただくようになって……\nわたしの……理:
That's when...I came to serve Lady Dorothea...
He's... my ideal master. Ehehe...
必要な時に、的確な指示をくれる……そんな素晴らしいドロテア様を\nご主人様と呼べ:
He'll give me precise instructions when I need to... Such a wonderful Lady Dorothea
Being able to call you Master is my little pride...
……ん？ 今スマートデバイスの振動音が聞こえたような……: ...Hm? I think I just heard the sound of a smart device vibrating...
え？ ……あ、わたしですね。\nちょっと失礼します。リュシー様から連絡が……:
Huh? Oh, it's me.
Excuse me for a moment. Lady Lucy contacted me...
はい、もしもし……はい…………はい、\nはい……はい…………:
Yes, hello... Yes... Yes,
Yes... Yes...
（深刻そうだが……もしかしてドロテアか誰かに、\n何かあったのか……？）:
(It looks serious, but...maybe Dorothea or someone
Did something happen...?)
よ……洋菓子店に行って、\n取り置きしていたお茶菓子を買ってくるように……って…:
Yo... I went to the western confectionery shop,
Like I'm going to buy the tea cakes I left behind... Wait...
ど、どうしてそんな無茶なことをぉ……！\nリュシーさまぁ……:
Wh-Why would you do something so reckless...!?
Lady Lucy...
えっと……とりあえず、元気出そう？: Umm... Anyway, how about cheering up?
（ドロテア達に何かあったわけではなさそうだ。\nだが……）:
(It doesn't look like anything happened to Dorothea and the others.
But...)
むりむりむり……！ むりですよぉ～！！\nわたしの性格、知ってるはずなのに、リュ:
No, no, no! I can't do this!
You should know my personality, Lady Lucy! Why?!
（これは多分、ひとりでおつかいを成功させて\n自信を持たせよう……みたいな感じだ:
(This is probably a successful errand on my own
I guess it's like... trying to give her confidence.)
涙目になったケイトは、\n先ほど懐にしまったばかりの写真を取り出して拝み始めた。:
Tears welled up in Kate's eyes
She took out the photo she had just put in her pocket and began to worship it.
ひぃ～ん……！ ひ、ひとりでお使いなんて無理ですぅ……！\nドロテア様、リュシー:
Eeek...! I-I can't run errands on my own...!
Lady Dorothea, Lady Lucy, p-please give me courage...!
（あ、そっかケイトにはお守りがあったな。\nこれできっと――）:
(Oh, right. Kate had a charm.
With this, I'm sure――)
うぅ、その視線やめてくださいぃ……自分でもわかってるんです……: Ugh, please stop looking at me like that... Even I know that...
お守りにすがったところで行動するのは自分なんだって……\n結局、お守りがあっても:
Even if you cling to the charm, you're the one who's going to act...
In the end, it's my fault for not being able to move even if I have a charm...
マンボウ並みに脆弱で情けないのがわたしなんです……\nほんとだめ人間なんです……:
I'm as fragile and pathetic as a sunfish...
She really is a hopeless person...
魚の話はともかく、\n次々出てくる卑下をさすがに見かねて、一つ提案をしてみる。:
Putting aside the fish talk,
Unable to bear to watch the vulgarity that came out one after another, I made a suggestion.
なぁ、良かったら俺とシミュレーションしてみるか？\nちゃんとおつかいができるよう:
Hey, would you like to run a simulation with me?
I'll be able to do my job properly.
要するに、ごっこ遊びだ。\n俺が店員をし、ケイトが客のシミュレーションだな。:
Basically, it's a game of pretend.
I'll be the clerk, and Kate's simulating the customers.
ありがたいですが……で、でも、わたし、\nカバ並みにどんくさいんです……:
I'm grateful, but... B-But, I...
It's as dull as a hippo...
練習したところで……成長できないかもです……: Even if I practice... I might not be able to grow...
まぁやるだけやってみよう。\n何事もやってみなきゃわからないしな。:
Well, let's do what we can.
We won't know until we try.
設定としては、店内に入ったところから……: As for the setting, from the moment we entered the store...
いらっしゃいませ。何かお探しですか？: Welcome. Are you looking for something?
唇はぱくぱく動いているような気がするのだが、\n声が全く聞こえてこない。:
I feel like her lips are opening and closing, but...
I couldn't hear her voice at all.
その……なんだ、もうちょっと声のボリューム出してもらっていいか？: Umm... Can I ask you to raise your voice a little more?
（謝るときは、声が出るんだけど……）: (My voice comes out when I apologize, but...)
（肝心なところで、ほとんど声が出てない……）: (I can barely speak at the most important part...)
（やっと何とか、『取り置きのケーキを取りに来ました』ってのが、\n薄っすら推測含:
(Finally, she managed to say, "I'm here to get a spare cake.")
It feels like I can understand it, even if it's just a guess...)
仕方ない。とりあえず単語だけでも、\n店員さんに伝えられるようにしよう。:
It can't be helped. For now, I'll just use the words...
Let's tell the clerk.
例えば『予約しているケーキを取りに来ました』なら、\n『予約』『ケーキ』『取り来:
For example, "I'm here to get the cake you're booking" would be a good idea
"Reservation," "Cake," and "I got it" probably wouldn't work either.
（問題は伝え方が完全にカタコトになるくらいで……）: (The problem is that the way she's conveying it is completely off-putting...)
うぅ……敬語すら使えないって思われちゃう……\nでも……それなら……なんとか、で:
Ugh... They'll think I can't even be polite...
But... in that case... I might be able to do something...? Yes...
これ以上時間を使うと取りに行く時間を過ぎてしまうし、\nそれで挑戦してみよう。:
If I use any more time, it'll be past time to go get it,
Let's try it with that.
――さて、そろそろお店が近いな。: —Now then, it's about time for the shop to close.
あの……やっぱり代わりに言ってもらえませんか……？: Um... Could you tell me instead...?
これはケイトが頼まれたメイドの仕事だろ？\nなら、ケイトがやらないといけないし、:
This is the maid job Kate asked for, isn't it?
In that case, Kate has to do it, and she has to.
なんだかんだで、俺ともいつの間にかちゃんと話せてるだろ？\nだから大丈夫だ。:
For some reason, you've been able to talk to me without me noticing, right?
That's why it's okay.
そ、それは%usernameusernameuserna%さんが、\nもう怖い人:
Th-That's because %usernameusernameuserna%-san...
It's because I know he's not scary anymore...
リュシーだって本当に無理だと思ってるならやらせないさ。\nケイトなら頑張ればでき:
If you really think it's impossible, I won't let you do it.
Kate can do it if she tries... That's what I think, so I left it to her.
そうこなくっちゃ！: That's how it has to be!
あ、もしかしてご予約商品を取りに来られた方ですか？: Oh, are you here to pick up your reserved goods?
はい、ではお名前をお伺いしてもよろしいでしょうかー？: Yes, then may I ask your name?
はい、確認いたしました。ご予約なさっているのは、\nこちら季節のフルーツタルトで:
Yes, I've confirmed it. The person making the reservation is...
Isn't this a seasonal fruit tart?
ではこちらの用紙に記載のほうをお願いします。: Please write it down on this form.
ふぅ……途中外から見ててヒヤヒヤしたけど、\nなんとか上手くいって良かったな。:
Phew... I got chills watching from outside partway through, but...
I'm glad it worked out somehow.
ありがとうございます……本当にありがとうございます……\nおかげで……リュシー様:
Thank you... Thank you so much...
Thanks to that... Lady Lucy and Lady Dorothea will be happy too!
ケイトが頑張った結果だよ。: It's the result of Kate's hard work.
そんな……\n%usernameusernameuserna%さんのおかげです…:
No way...
It's all thanks to %usernameusernameuserna%...
あの……ひとつお願いしてもいいでしょうか……: Umm... Can I ask you a favor...?
ふたり目のご主人様に、なっていただけませんか……！？: Will you become my second Master...!?
あ、あああああ――やっぱり、蚊並みのクソ雑魚生物なんかに\nご主人様なんて呼ばれ:
A-Aaaaahhhh—I knew it—it's a shitty little creature on the level of a mosquito
You don't want to be called Master, do you...? I'm sorry...
い、いや、どうしていきなりそんな話に……？: N-No, why are you bringing that up all of a sudden...?
……今回のおつかい、\nきっとわたしだけじゃ果たせませんでした。:
...This errand...
I'm sure I wouldn't have been able to do it alone.
そもそも、最初は落とし物を届けていただいただけなのに、\nわたしが勘違いして逃げ:
In the first place, she'd only delivered the lost item to me at first
I misunderstood and ran around, causing trouble for you...
なのに、全然わたしを責めるどころか、\n更にはおつかいの練習にまで付き合っていた:
And yet, rather than blaming me at all,
And you even helped me practice errands...!
そしてシミュレーションの――%usernameusernameuserna%さん:
And the simulation—%usernameusernameuserna%-san.
I did my best, just like she said, and now I'm able to take the cake...
いやまぁ、それは結果論というか、結果オーライというか……: Well, I guess you could say that's a result theory, or rather, all's well that ends well...
だから、ふたりめのご主人様に、なってほしいんです！: That's why I want you to be my second Master!
（そう、まっすぐ見つめられると弱いけど……\n受け入れたらそれはそれでまずいよう:
(Yes, I'm weak when she looks straight at me, but...)
If I accept it, that would be bad in its own way...)
で、でも、君にはすでにドロテアという、ご主人様がいるだろう？\nふたりに仕えてい:
B-But you already have a master named Dorothea, don't you?
Do you have the time and leeway to serve them?
あのドロテアって女さぁ、めちゃイタくない？: Isn't that Dorothea woman really annoying?
分かる～。お嬢様だからってお高くとまっててムカつくよね。\nちょっと強いだけで、:
I get it~ Just because she's a rich girl doesn't mean she'll stop being so expensive.
It's just a little strong, but Senko and the others are all fussing about learning from him.
（今聞こえた会話……あの制服はケイト達と同じ、\nユーロ・タワーの校舎の制服か？:
(The conversation I just heard... Those uniforms are the same as Kate and the others
Is that the Euro Tower school uniform?)
実は似非お嬢だったりして。: Maybe she's actually a fake young lady.
ウケる、なりきりプレイってこと？ アイタタタタ～。: Are you saying it's fun? Ouch, ouch, ow!
やだっ、何これっ、なんでぇっ！？ スカートどこいったの！？: No, what's this? Why?! Where'd your skirt go?!
ね、ねえ、なにあれ……露出プレイ？\n下着きわどっ！:
H-Hey, what's that...? Exposed play?
Underwear!
うわー引くわー……あれって、ユーロの制服だよね？\n清楚お嬢様達の背徳プレイ的な:
Wow, that's gross... That's the Euro uniform, isn't it?
It's like Seiso Ojou-sama and the others are playing dirty...?
な、何が起こったんだ……？\nいきなりあの子達から、一瞬でスカートが消滅したよう:
Wh-What happened...?
It's like my skirt disappeared from those girls in an instant...
お、ケイト、いつの間に……さっきまでどこに――: Oh, Kate, when did you... Where were you just a moment ago?
ま、まさか、ケイトの仕業……？ だったのか？: D-Don't tell me it was Kate's doing...? Was it?
今回は恥をかくくらいで……ゆ、許します……: I-I'll forgive you... for embarrassing me this time...
……とんでもない身のこなしだな。\n一体どこでそんな身体能力を……:
...That's one hell of a move.
Where in the world did you learn such a physical ability...?
（というか、全然見えなかったぞ……？）: (Actually, I couldn't see it at all...)
え、えっと……実家がちょっと体育会系でして……: U-Umm... My family runs a bit of a sports festival...
（もしかするとこの子、\n実は怒らせたらいけない子なのかもしれないな……）:
(Perhaps this girl,
Maybe she's actually the kind of girl I shouldn't anger...)
そう思い、認識を改める俺であった――: With that thought in mind, I changed my mind――
